actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize certain grants to be made to the Government of the Virgin Islands.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to make grants to the government of the Virgin Islands upon its application to be used for any governmental purpose. Authorizes to be appropriated $12,000,000 for each of the next six fiscal years to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize certain grants to be made to the Government of the Virgin Islands.
